$MSFT 

If you look at the candles & 10SMA I highlighted, that is just a very aggressive smack down from that moving average both times. Wow this has been a complete train wreck starting 12/29. It has traded down -19 days- 1/24 - exactly a month ago. Our last top high was on 2/2, 16 trading days ago but we are above the 10 but overall some really bearish stuff going on right here with the moving averages. Double MACD cross below 0, RSI is hitting oversold when MACD red but not hitting overbought when MACD is green, currently sitting at 47.50.. is it going to continue the pattern of hitting oversold? That’s what you do in a bear market but we’re not ready for that conversation yet. Right? 🤭 This will be interesting tomorrow..
